about_the_game:
Grandma Studios returns with the newest spell-binding adventure in the Reflections of Life series!

Countless years have passed since the Spindle of Fate brought chaos and destruction to the worlds, making the artifact little more than a relic…or so you thought. That is until the warlike people it wiped out come back with a vengeance! The Nilds have returned for the Spindle they created, capable of shaping the fates of all the realms. And if they find its parts first, everyone will be at their mercy. Only a Guardian of your caliber can find the fabled keepers of the artifact and stop the Nilds from using their power to wreak devastation! Can you traverse new and challenging lands to save them from ruin in time? Find out in this breathtaking Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!



This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version!

The Collector’s Edition includes:

• When reality begins to crumble, fate weaves a surprising new tale in the bonus game!
• Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games and earn achievements!
• Tons of collectible music sheets and hidden/morphing power pearls to find!
• Unlock the secret room and enjoy the soundtrack, cinematics, wallpapers, concept art, and more!
• Never get lost with the strategy guide!
